concept.title: Expression
concept.shortdesc: The Expression processor performs calculations on incoming data on a row-by-row basis. It writes the results of the calculations to a new field in the pipeline.

conbody.p: To create an expression, you define the name of the field to receive the results of the expression and the expression that you want to use. Use the expression language to define the calculations that you want to use.

You can define constants that you can use in any expression in the processor. Define a constant when you have a constant value that you use in more than one expression or that you want to change easily.
